name: Shadow Siege: Rogue Island
description:
Epic Survival Combat

One life, one death. Tread with care and fight through each hostile base in this open world shooter role-playing game.

Shadow Siege: Rogue Island will be available for PC on August 2nd, 2018. Please subscribe for a notification when the game releases and updates when new features are added.

Together or Alone

Pair up and work together or go and battle the island alone. Cooperation helps you overcome what you couldn't by yourself, but be careful not to shoot your partner!

Select Your Character

Select one of three distinct characters: soldier (shield), sniper (slow time), or rogue (invisibility). Combine your power with your partner's to create an advantage.


Kentucky Fried Pixels

Shadow Siege: Rogue Island will be made available as part of #KentuckyFriedPixels. Score a sweet deal when you purchase Shadow Siege in the bundle with other Kentucky-made video games! https://itch.io/b/246/kentucky-fried-pixels-2018

Thank You For Checking Out Our Game

Thank you for taking time to check out our page and showing your support! ❤️

Shadow Siege: Rogue Island will be available for PC on August 2nd, 2018. Please subscribe for updates and share this page with your friends! We will never sell or abuse email addresses sent to us.

 

 - Ben & Colton
